article: Everybody loves a good joke. Even children at a very young age start  _  jokes to their friends. Some people are  _  very good at telling funny stories. When they tell a joke, everyone finds it  _  But someone else telling the same joke may not make you laugh. This is because it is not only the end of the joke that has to be funny. A good joke-teller is amusing  _  telling the whole story. Some people are witty (,) in their normal everyday conversation. They say humorous things all the time. They can quickly see two  _  words in the same word and then like to make puns . If someone says to them, after their trip to the US. "How did you find New York?" They will probably answer by saying something like, "By driving south from Boston!" There is another type of humor where people play jokes on their  _  . They tease them by saying untrue things like, "Someone just  _  me that our English teacher is going to give us a test today." When their friends start to worry, they laugh and say, "I am only  _  ." These people love to make  _  of you, make you silly and ridiculous. And nobody likes to be made fun of,  _  , of course, on April 1 . On this day, everyone is allowed to play jokes on their friends.
